The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

La Cerollera, Teruel

Katherine Dau

Verified

The Church of los Remedios was built in the baroque style in the 18th century by architect Antonio Moreno. During the Civil War, all altarpieces were destroyed.

Works cited

  1. “La Cerollera” Bajo Aragon.
  2. “LA IGLESIA PARROQUIAL DE NUESTRA SEÑORA DEL REMEDIO” Fundación Quílez Llisterri.
  3. “Historia” La Cerollera
